alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 09 at 7:44AM AKST until February 11 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to one quarter mile or less at times.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very hazardous.
